sn47.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati ambapalivane.
sn47.1:2.1: “Ekayanvayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana.
sn47.1:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.1:2.4: vedanasu vedananupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.1:2.5: citte cittanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.1:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.1:2.7: Ekayanvayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana”ti.
sn47.1:3.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
